name: MEC Neck Gaiter - Children to Youths
categories: Toddler and child neck gaiters and scarves
description:
Now longer and wider for a roomier fit, this neck gaiter is ultra-soft and stretchy.Made of 100% polyester fleece.Flat seams so there's no chafing.
